name: Hypnosis Reveries
description:
Based on the Jessien's interdisciplinary research in VR related fields over the past decade, HYPNOSIS REVERIES takes an abstract and minimalist approach to tell a story about growing. Through a 20-minute exploration experience, you will step into a mental maze, looking back at the important moments that changed you, and see yourself again.

*HYPNOSIS REVERIES is originally a large-space VR experience using a redirected walking algorithm invented by Jessien.
*The current version available on Steam is a remade version, supporting Standing and Sitting modes.
